description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              If you are a student or a fresh graduate who is eager to gain the very first working experience in a good environment, join our team and you will be in charge of:
              

              1. Data input - 50%
              
              •	Converting data from Excel to Recruitment System
              
              •	Support in managing the system's data.
              
              1. Recruitment - 50%
              
              •	Posting and searching job on the website
              
              •	Screening CV & phone interviewing with potential candidates and arranging appointments for interviewing.
              
              •	Inputting the candidate information to HR system
              
              •	Assisting Talent Acquisition team in recruiting event.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1.	Full skill practices and applications of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, email.
              
              2.	Passionate interest in HR, especially recruitment
              
              3.	Excellent communication skills in both English and Vietnamese.
              
              4.	Can work full-time during the 3-month internship.
